sentences.en: After a 6 year apprenticeship I became a journeyman at 19.
sentences.cn: 学徒六年后,我19岁,那时我已经是一名熟练工.

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: Electrician: Applicants must have valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Electrician certification.
sentences.cn: 电工: 申请者必须拥有有效的阿尔伯塔省或跨省熟练工电工认证.

sentences.en: Heavy Equipment Technician: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Heavy Equipment Technician certification is required.
sentences.cn: 重型设备技术员: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工重型设备技术员证书是必需的.

sentences.en: Instrumentation Technician: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Instrumentation Technician certification is required.
sentences.cn: 仪表技术员: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工仪表技术员证书是必需的.

sentences.en: Millwright: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Millwright certification is required.
sentences.cn: 米尔赖特: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工米尔赖特认证是必需的.

sentences.en: Mr Rosen discusses why good inventors require a healthy dose of delusion and just how much practice (at anything from tennis to blacksmithing) is required to turn a journeyman into a master.
sentences.cn: 诺森先生讨论了优秀发明家需要一定量幻觉的原因，把一个出师的熟练工转变成为大师所需的练习量。

sentences.en: The choice was to be a journeyman developer or become a manager, and I've never wanted to be a manager -- at least not a manager who went for an MBA and had ambitions to be a captain of industry.
sentences.cn: 我的选择就是要做一个技术熟练的开发人员还是成为一名经理，而我从来没有想要成为一名经理--至少没想成为一名拥有 MBA 学位并立志成为业内领军人的经理。

sentences.en: The mercer's journeyman came rushing upon me with such fury as very much frighted me.
sentences.cn: 那个绸缎商的伙计气势汹汹地向我冲来,把我吓了一大跳.

sentences.en: Then I proceeded to tell how the journeyman treated me.
sentences.cn: 然后我继续说到那个伙计怎样对待我.

sentences.en: Welding: Valid Alberta or Interprovincial Journeyman Welding certification is required.
sentences.cn: 焊接: 有效艾伯塔省或跨省熟练工焊接认证是必需的.

words.tran_cn: [劳经]熟练工人；短工；学徒期满的职工

trans.tran_cn: 学徒期满的职工，熟练工人
trans.tran_en: an experienced worker whose work is acceptable but not excellent
